sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Flex, Heading, Input, Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Switch, Avatar, useColorMode, useColorModeValue, FormHelperText, background, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import './form.css' function Form() { const { toggleColorMode } = useColorMode(); const formBackground = useColorModeValue('gray.300','gray.700'); return ( Welcome Нэвтрэх нэр Нууц үг {/* Enable Dark Mode? */} ) } export default Form
